original_text: And the man Micah had a shrine, and he made an ephod and household gods, and ordained one of his sons, who became his priest.
korean_text: 그 사람 미가에게 신당이 있으므로 그가 에봇과 드라빔을 만들고 한 아들을 세워 그의 제사장으로 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: And the man Micah had a shrine
and he made an ephod and household gods
and ordained one of his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 아들 중 하나를 제사장으로 세웠는데
